name: tm52
effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
